Footer.disclosures: Bayyananniyar abubuwan da ya kamata a bayyana

TimelineContent.heroTitle: Ni mai tunani daga England na kasancewar jiya-jiya a cikin AirBnb's a US/UK/EU. Ina sha'awa da crypto, abubuwan farawa da ha…ìaka software. Ina da abin da ya gabata a cikin jarin jari da kuma wasa.
TimelineContent.timeline2025Title: ∆òaddamar da LiquidOps mainnet & mayar da hankali ga ci gaba
TimelineContent.timeline2025Description: Jiya na kashe lokacina na ∆ôaddamar da [LiquidOps' mainnet](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1905268807746060790?s=20). Aya daga cikin masu mahimmanci koyi da na karanta jiya shine cewa startups ba su da labarai akan allunan kawai. Ci gaba da sulheci suna da mahimmanci kamar (ko fiye da) allunan, saboda haka na fara [yin abubuwa](/projects#content-creator) da mayar da hankali ga ci gaba.
TimelineContent.timeline2024Description: Na samu ra'ayi da [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops) tare da [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer) a cikin wannan shekara bayan jaji mai abin takaici a Cambridge inda nake zama a lokacin. [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) ya kasance a farkon sa kuma mun yi tunanin sauri gamrin da wata hanyar da za ta iya amfani da yawan ku…ói na halin yanzu na jama'a. Kuma na aiki a matsayin Jirgin Aikacin a [AO Ventures](https://aoventures.io). Na ba da goyo bayan ayyukan da ke cikin jama'a kuma na taimaka wajen yanke shawara wanda ya samu hamsin jari daga angle na fasaha, a gida na kuma cikin nuni tare da sabuwar ra'ayi nawa - [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops).
TimelineContent.timeline2023Title: Othent an gina shi akan Arweave
TimelineContent.timeline2023Description: Na zama malamin farko na waje a [Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) ka…óai bayan tukiyar seed nasu. Na mayar da [Wallety](/projects#wallety) ku…ói don tumanin gida ga [Arweave](https://arweave.org) jama'a. A zamanin nawa akaci na aiki na [Othent](/projects#othent), Oases kuma [Subsidise.js](/projects#subsidisejs).
TimelineContent.timeline2022Title: Na shiga Community Labs & na koyo ni kaina
TimelineContent.timeline2022Description: Bayan da na fahimta cewa saka jari bai sa ni alaka ba kamar yadda gini yake, na tashi kan gida don koya rubuce-rubuce daga farko. A ∆ôarshe na koya rubuce-rubuce cikin sauri kuma na gina aikin farko [Wallety](/projects#wallety). Jiya ya kasance mai gajiya amma mai murna. Sannan [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) ya natsu wa hankalin sa wuce gida, wanda ya zama kaura kirguwa kuma na yanke shawarar ha…óa shi a [Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) a matsayin abokin jiya na gida na farko.
TimelineContent.timeline2021Title: Na tsera da crypto VC daga …óakinana
TimelineContent.timeline2021Description: Na kar…ìi karatu ba tare da ku…ói ba a jarin jari na crypto mula cikin shekara da ta gabata na yin sanye-sanye. Na aiki tsawon wata 3 ba tare da ku…ói ba kafin su ba ni kawacen kasuwa, na kuma aiki akan jarin su da ku…ói na gida tsawon shekara gida. Na kusan lokaci nawa a taimaka kan jari da …ìangare da kuma jaba littafi a cikin ranar majalissu na jari. Kuma a wannan shekara na kuma jaimari a matsayin [Polkadot Ambassador](https://polkadot.com/community/ambassador-program) ina da tafiya a gida game da jama'a. An bugi jama'a da jama'a kuma jama'a da abubuwan da jama'a.
TimelineContent.timeline2020Description: Lokacin da nake fara karatun wasa a [Emil Dale Academy](https://www.emildale.co.uk), na fara channel na TikTok na Crypto wanda ke nuna jama'a ta Gen Z abubuwan crypto. Wajin yin ∆ôo∆ôari na shiga aiki na jari, na sanye-sanye na karuwar kambi ama da kambi, jari-jari da abubuwan da suka kai kusan 500. Daga cikin sanye-sanye ka…óai jari 6 na dada. Na kasance na yin jajjegoro Zoom a shiyar kasuwa da wayar abokinana wanda ya kasance da bayani yayin da nake watse abin karatua don yin shawarar kasua game da karba…óe. Ya kasance lokaci mai abin mamaki a raina kuma ya ci gida daga lokacin gida. Kuma a wannan shekara na kuma tara ku…ói don karatun wasa ta tara tuffar jama'a don sayar a eBay don biyan ku…óin karatun bayan kar…ìar ilhami daga Gary Vee, ya yi aiki!
TimelineContent.timeline2019Description: Na shiga jama'ar Ethereum a 2019 bayan koyo abubuwan jujjuyawar da ta jiki.
TimelineContent.timeline2017Description: Yayin da abokanina suka kasance suna sayar da magas, nake gyara allo don ku…ói.

TimelineContent.timeline2026Description: A cikin wannan shekara LiquidOps ya sami [Astro](https://www.astrousd.com/), wanda aka kafa shi ta hanyar abokin jiya na gida [Kadar Sayed Abdi](https://x.com/0xKadar).

AngelPage.title: Jarin Malaika
introAndElevator: Ina jin da…ói tare da jama'ar masu farawa wanda suke aiwatar da abubuwan da suke tsintsatsa a gaske. Lokacin da nake ganin wuri da hanyoyin da zan iya taimaka ba kawai da ku…ói ba, ina da sha'awa na shiga da wuri.

Na kasance ina sayar da aljihu a tsakanin **$500 zuwa $5,000** a kafin ku…óin kar…ìa…óe kuma a kar…ìawacin seed. Kodayake ban sayar da aljihu mafi babba ba, ina yin ∆ôo∆ôari da aiki. Har kaifi shine karuwa, ba da mayar da ra'ayi, shawarwarin fasaha, ko kuma kasancewar mutum da za a iya magana tare da shi game da matsaloli, duba bayani masu zuwa a cikin abubuwan da na fara da karai.

Bayyananniya, na kasance mai aiki mai mahimmanci a jiya kuma ina shirin kasancewar …óaya tsawon lokaci da gabas, don haka ban iya fara hankali mai yuwuwar ga kamfanoni na jarin da na jira ba. Na kasance na jara ku…ói ne a cikin ∆ôungiyoyin da kake aiwatar a kamannin ma'amala da na aiwatar a jiya, saboda haka zan iya taimaka ji da matsaloli. Jami'i bayani masu kauri akan abubuwan da na yi a ∆ôasa.
AngelPage.helpTitle: Abubuwan da suka fi sani da na yi Wanda za su iya taimaka maka
helpItems: Ba zan iya ba ka shawarwari akan matsaloli na shari'a/lissafi, amma zan iya nuna ka inda fa masu da iya taimaka ‚Äî lawyerso, accountanti, da masu kasu (kuma yin ∆ôo∆ôari in tabbatar kin ba da kasuwa ta matakin babbar ku…ói). Zuwa jiya na aiwatar da …óaya kawai da ∆ôunye da iyakacin lokaci a Barkutwa kuma 1 Delaware C masu jarin.
Na koyo ni kaina a zama cikakken sunan mai yin fature daga internet
Na lura da karamin jama'ar masu aiki da suke iya aiwatar da sauri
Na kammala sayar da jarin ku…ói daga VCs, masu kwayo, gida kasuwa gida, kuma wajen bada malaika da aka toshe
Na kasa sayar da jarin ku…ói daga gida
Na aiki a abubuwan farawa/VCs/kamfanoni kuma na yi kusan kowannen aiki, tare da CEO, mai yin fature, analyst, na yi abubuwan COO kuma na kasance mai sayar software masu kasu
Kamar da za a iya ganin daga saitin nawa, nai aiki mai tabakatarwa. Yana da alhaki kuma na ina bugar da sa duka zan iya ka aiki/ciyar da shi.
Na …ìugi jerin da ake jinki wanda ya kasance da dubur sadarwa kuma ya girma zuwa $55m a zabe da aka jajjegoro
Na aiwatar/design/…ìugi abubuwan yada a abubuwan farawa da kamfanoni na kamfani
Na aiwatar da slides, yada, kuma sharutu na kasuwa da nasara kuma da waji
AngelPage.pressureTitle: Ina Karbeyi Matsaloli Nan gida Matsi kuma Samar musu Hanyoyin Warkat
pressureItems: Na gyara matsaloli masu canji na dabu a dubu da kamfani ta DeFi
Na tsira daga …óaya babbar jarin crypto na shekara
Na karantawa a gaban jama'ar da online kuma duka na yi nasara kuma GIDA na bugi shawarawai
Na aiwatar da kasuwar IP, sayar da IP, kuma karba…óe kamfani
Na aiwatar da jama'ar kuma duka na karba…óe da yi wa jama'a abubuwan gane
Na aiwatar da accountanti, lawyerso, masu sayar jare, kuma kamfanoni na kasua
Na yin sanye-sanye inda kamfani/jama'ar suka kasance maimakon damla (jiya dai ina son wutar gini)
Na jajjegoro kamfani a gida kuma suka dadi karba…óe
Na kasance mai aiki da gida mai gaskiya, na aiki da waje, na aiwatar da gida gaskiya, kuma na gyara kamfani nawa kuma nawa lokaci
A jiya ne na jajjegoro bayani masu canji na mutum da kuma na kasance masu dukana karuwa da jiyaya
An watsini jarin cikakkin kasuwa masu diya crypto
Na tsaya kuma na kashe shigo na gida da malabus oyi
Na aiki a kamfanoni masu gaskiya, na aiki a waje, na aiwatar da gida gaskiya, kuma na gyara kamfani nawa na aiki karuwa
A jiya ne nawa an jajjegoro wasa. Zan iya taimaka ka kada ka kasance mai girma a abubuwan kasua da demo day pitch
Na kasance mai aiki da pitch na VC kuma suka kasance aiki mai biyayya
Na yi ma hanyoyin macece karuwa karuwa
Na kasance da karbuwan tsafacin karuwa
Na gyara abubuwan yada kuma na yi amfani da kayan aiki kamar da Figma kuma Webflow
AngelPage.mistakesTitle: Manyan kuskurenta wanda ban so ka
mistakesItems: Na kasua na kudin dala 50,000 USD akan kudin jiya na zagayowar kudin da za'a iya kasua dala 5,000
Na kasua dala 75,000 USD akan bincike don samfuri kafin ya sami rabon kasuwa
Na kusan shekara yana gina samfuri kuma ba ni jiya gaske ga ha…ìaka da tattalin arzi∆ôi
Na gamda tajila kudin da ya kawar da duk ajiyoyina kuma ya kawo da ni gida cikin -60,000 kudin dala sarauta kuma ina cikin bashi jiya
Na kashe sosai jiya ni ta tattauna kasuwa dake gida kuma na tattauna jiya kuma na sake gina
Na manta da ∆ôimar dala daya kuma nawa ne suka tafi
Na rasa kudin dala dubudu zuwa kudin tattalin arzi∆ôi daga kuskure na ba ta hankali ta amfani da software daidai ba
Na ha…ìaka kuma na rasa ganin ∆ôasuwar bayina
AngelPage.ctaTitle: Ba ku abubuwan da suka mace?
AngelPage.ctaText: Ina jin da…ói na jarikin abubuwan.
AngelPage.astroDescription: Astro yana sau∆ôa∆ôar sarrafa kudin blockchain a matsayin mai kasuwa stablecoin.
AngelPage.velaventuresDescription: Studio na Web3 gida a bayan abubuwan kamar da [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com), [Vento](https://ventoswap.com/?tab=swap) da [AO Sync](https://github.com/vela-ventures/ao-sync-sdk).
AngelPage.upshotDescription: Kasuwar abubuwan masu sani na farko, an gina shi a Base ecosystem.
AngelPage.saySoDescription: Kasuwar hasashen Web3 wanda aka gina a cikin jijiya ta Sei blockchain.
AngelPage.plasmaOrbitalDescription: Kamfani mai yin aiki na yayyafar satellites ∆ôananan don lura da gaida.

content.content: Shafin nan ya ∆ôunshi bayyananniyar mahimmanci game da ayyukan ba da jiya na malamai. Tashi ji yaron kalaman nan jiya kafin ka tunka…óa ni game da janyuwar jiya.
Jiya daga Jiya na Gida Kawai

Na ba da jiya daga jiya na gida. Ba ni **ba** tasgon jiya mai mallin kudin, ba ni **ba** sarrafa tasgon, kuma ba ni **ba** kar…ìi jiya daga 'yan haushin (LPs) ko wani mai jiya daban. Duk yanke shawarwari na jiya ana yin shi ni kadai ta amfani da jiya ta gida.
Ba Shawarwari na Jiya ba

Abin da bai shafi ta gida ne ba, sai a yi fashi a matsayin shawarwari na jiya, shariya, lissafi, kudin mutane, ko shawarwari na rayuwa. Ba ni **ba** ∆ôa∆ô∆ôa ko a sarrafa ta hanyar Hukumar Gudanarwa ta Kasuwa (FCA) ko wani tasgon sarrafa kudin. Duk yanke shawarwari na jiya da ka yi shi ne alaka ta kai.
Babu Jiya na ∆äangi
Ba ni baiwa jiya na …óangi ga magajiya ko kamfani da na ba da jiya sai abin da aka bayyana a abin jiya. Ni mai jiya ne, ba ni ba magajiya, jami'a, ko mai jiya na …óangi.
Ba Bukaci na Jiya ba
Abin da bai shafi ta gida ne ba ba ∆ôar∆ôashi jiya, tayin, ko toshewa na jiya a wani kamfani, kudin, ko samfurin jiya. Kowane bayani game da kamfanin jiya ta gida shi ne don bayani kawai.
Babu Bani na Jiya
Tunka…óa ni ko aika mani gida-gida ta kai **ba** wata jiya cewa za a ba da jiya. Na dubi janyuwa ta musamman kuma na ba da jiya a ka…óan kasuwa kwa shekara (matsakaici 1-2).
Iyaka ta Jiya

Yanzu ni magajiya ta jiya kuma na niyya su yi haka na jiya, to ba ni iya ba da cikakken kulun zuwa kamfani na jiya. Na iyakance na ba da jiya kawai a kamfani da suka gina a kankara iri iri zuwa abin da na gina jiya ko ashe, don na kira taimako kai zuwa warwarar.
Babu Alaka na Shawarwari

Ba ni ba shawarwari kamfani ko magajiya. Na tunani cewa masu shawarwari ba su daidaita ba (sai da gaske ga kamfani na ∆ôarshe) ‚Äî [kalli Steve Jobs bayyana dalilin ta](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-c4CNB80SRc). Na ba da jiya kawai a magajiya da ra'ayoyi da na so in yi alaka kuma na tunani na iya taimakawa gina.
Dabi'ar Farkon Matsayi

Kila ba ni gida a ba taimako zuwa magajiya na gida. Ni farkon matsayi kuma iya taimaka mutane a matsayi na farko (kafin Series A) sannan. Amma idan kai magajiya na gida kuma ka tunani na iya taimakawa, ba na ga sha'awa.
Abubuwan Kudin Mutane

Duk kudin mafi gaske da aka ambata (kamar SEIS ko EIS) suna ∆ôar∆ôashin alaka ta kai kuma HMRC ka'idodi. Za ka nemi shawarwari kudin mutane waje. Ba ni baiwa wata bayani game da kudin mutane matsayi na wani jiya.
Asira

Idan ka aika bayani na asira zuwa ni, zan daw da shi da hankali waje, amma ba ni iya bani tabbatarwa cikakken asira. Na iya samun kankara ra'ayoyi daban daban daga magajiya daban. Kar ka aika bayani da ba ka daidai ba ki bayyana. Sai idan na sanya alamar asira na yaduwa ta rubuta tare da kai, ba ni da janyuwa na daw da bayani ba asira.
Adawa ta Sha'awa
Na iya ba da jiya a kamfani da suka ka…ói juna ko kamfani da kai ke gina. Ba ni wajabi a bayyana jiya daban daban zuwa kai, kuma ba ni wajabi a hana ba da jiya a kamfani da suke ka…ói juna.
Gargajiya ta Ha…óari

**Jiya ba da jiya a kamfani na farkon matsayi yana …óauki babbar matsayi. Za ka iya rasa duka jiya ta kai.** Abubuwan da aka yi ba su nuni abubuwan da za su yi ba. ∆òimar jiya na iya ragu haka kuma sauran. Jiya na farkon matsayi ba ta cikin rashin aiki kuma ka iya ba sa jiya a watannin da yawa, ko ba kaikaice ba.

content.title: Matsayi na Mai Jiya na UK
content.content: Ni **Mai Jiya na Kanta-Gida na Tutiya** a ∆ôar∆ôashin Aikin Aiki na Kasuwa kuma Kasuwa na 2000 (Balewa ta Shawarwari) Oda 2005. Na gamsu akan ∆ôasis na aiki a muhalli na kar…ìo kudin ba da kasuwa mai ∆ôancinki kuma ka…óan shekara cikin nan (a matsayin dan kakakin gida don hanyoyin kasuwa na sararin samaniya masu jinyawa jiya na farkon matsayi).
content.note: **Don Magajiya:** Ta aika abubuwan jiya zuwa ni, ka tabbatar cewa ka yi bincike ta musamman a ∆ôar∆ôashin ka'idodin Balewa ta Kasuwa na UK kuma ka tunani daidai cewa ni na zama abin kar…ìa sa…óa gida. Idan ka bukaci ni ni sanya sani na kaintaccen asira kafin aika gida, na kuwa jin dadi in yi haka.

content.content: Idan ka da wuni game da bayyananniyar nan, tunka…óa ni a heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Yarjejenadai zuwa Ka'idodi
Ta aika zuwa kuma amfani da lorimerjenkins.com ("Shafi"), ka yarjejenal za ka …óauke wannan Ka'idodi na Jiya ("Ka'idodi"). Idan ba ka yarjejenal da wannan Ka'idodi, tashi kar ka amfani da Shafi.
Bayanin Aiki

Lorimerjenkins.com shi ne shafi na gida wanda Lorimer Jenkins ke mallaki kuma ke sarrafa. Shafi na ba da bayani game da ayyukan da na yi, ayyukan, ayyukan ba da jiya na malamai, kuma sauran bayani da na za…ìi za aika.
Amfani da Shafi
Amfani mai kaideji
Ka yarjejenal za ka amfani da Shafi ne kawai don abubuwan shari'a kuma ta hanya da ba ta kici abubuwan sauran ko dakatar amfani su. Abubuwan da ba a yarda su sun ha…óa da, amma ba iyaka ne:

items: ∆òo∆ôarin isa Shafi ko tsaranta ba izini ba
Aika jirgi, cuta software, ko sauran bayani na illa
Amfani da tsaranta aka sarrafa (bots, scrapers) ba izini ba
Tso sha'awa, barazana, ko tsohu sauran mutane

content.content: Aiki na Shafi
Na ajiye kaifi na canja, dakatar, ko dakatar Shafi a kowane lokaci ba kirkirim ba, dakatar aiki zuwa sauran Shafi, kuma dakatar masu amfani da suka keta wannan Ka'idodi.
Bayani na Ba da Jiya na Malamai

Sashi na ba da jiya na malamai na wannan Shafi ana sarrafa don bayani kawai. Abin da bai shafi ta gida ba tabbatar cewa abin jiya, tayin ka saya ko sayar kudin, ko kasuwa, lissafi, kudin mutane, ko shawarwari na lissafi. Ba ni ∆ôa∆ô∆ôa ko a sarrafa ta hanyar Hukumar Gudanarwa ta Kasuwa (FCA). Tashi ga [bayyananniyar ba da jiya na malamai](/disclosures) don cikakken bayani.
Kasuwa Ilimi

Sai dai aka yi bayani, duk abin da ke Shafi, gida abin da ya ∆ôunshi rubutu, zane-zane, zane-zane, alama, zane-zane, kuma kodex, shi ne abin Lorimer Jenkins kuma shi ne karya da copyright, alama, kuma sauran kasuwa ilimi ka'idodi.

Aka ba ka iyaka marasa-marasa, marasa-marasa, ka ba da izini da iko zuwa aiki kuma amfani da Shafi don abubuwanda kai, babu kasuwa. Ba ka iya sake gida, aika, ko na sake yada Shafi bayani ba iko, canja ko gida abubuwan da suka hada daga Shafi bayani, amfani da abin Shafi don abubuwan kasuwa, ko tsinke copyright ko bayani na abubuwan daga abin.
Aikawa kuma Sadarwa

Idan ka aika gida-gida, shirin aiki, ko sauran bayani zuwa ni game da janyuwar ba da jiya: ka ajiye mallakin abin kai, ka ba ni marasa-marasa ka ba iko zuwa bincike kuma bincike abin kai, ba ni wajabi zuwa bincike abin kai ko ba da jiya, na iya kar…ìi da ra'ayoyi kama daga sauran tushen, kuma kai ne alaka ga kar…ìo asira ta kai.
Alaka daga Sauran

Shafi na iya ∆ôunshi alaka zuwa shagagge na mai-ka-kasuwa ko rasumin. Wa…óannan alakan ana samun su ne kawai don saniya. Ba ni alaka a abubuwan da suka yi, ingancin, ko abubuwan da suka samun sauran shagagge, duk illa na da aka ci daga amfani da sauran shagagge, ko samun sauran shagagge.
Dakatar Tabbacin

**SHAFI ANA SARRAFA A "KAMAR YANZU" KUMA "KAMAR ABIN DA AKA SAMUN" BA TABBACIN BA**, ko-madaidaiyar ko waje, babu abubuwan da ya ∆ôunshi tabbacin kasuwa, kasuwa don wacce abubuwan, cewa Shafi ya zama marasa-marasa, kariya, ko marasa-marasa, ko game da ingancin, aminci, ko kamsanin abin.
Dakatar Alaka

**GA MAFI YAWA KUSAN SHARI'A DA AKA YARDA, LORIMER JENKINS BA ZA A BANI ALAKA WA** marasa-marasa, marasa-gida, musamman, sauran, ko karbuwa illa, rasa arzi∆ôi, kudin mutane, bayani, ko amfani, illa daga amfani da Shafi, jiya illa, ko illa daga amfani da abin da ke Shafi.

Iyaka nan ta aiki a ∆ôar∆ôashin shari'a te kuma idan aka ba ni gida game da iyakar illa ta wannan. **Ba wata hali ba, duka alaka na ni ba…óo dala da kai da ka bayar zuwa aiki Shafi (wanda shi ne sunya).**
Dakatar Alaka

Ka yarjejenal zuwa dakatar, kariya, kuma ajiye harmless Lorimer Jenkins daga duk sukuwa, illa, raunin, alaka daban-daban, kuma kudin da suka taso daga amfani da Shafi, keta ka da Ka'idodi, keta ka da wuni na inna jama'a, duk yanke shawarwari na jiya da kai, ko duk abubuwan da ka aika.
Asira
Amfani da Shafi ma ana sarrafa ta [Lan∆ôwassar Asira](/privacy) nawa, wanda aka ha…óa da Ka'idodi ta abin.
Canja zuwa Ka'idodi
Na ajiye kaifi na canja Ka'idodi a kowane lokaci. Canja za ya zama aiki nan da gida ta wajen ta∆ôoin "Jiya na ∆òarshe". Amfani ka ke yi da Shafi bayan canja tabbatar ka kar…ìi canja Ka'idodi.
Shari'ar Gudnarwa

Ka'idodi nan za a sarrafa kuma a gina ta ∆ôar∆ôashin shari'ar Ingila kuma Wales. Duk adawa za a warwar ta ta tattaunawa mai kyau, kuma idan ta gazawar, kotun Ingila kuma Wales za ta taba iko na musamman.
Rabin Waje
Idan duk wani ta Ka'idodi ba ta gida ko marasa-gida, sauran Ka'idodi za ta ci ga gida kuma aiki.
Tunka…óa
Idan ka da wuni game da Ka'idodi nan, tunka…óa ni a heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Ta amfani da Shafi, ka gida cewa ka karanta, ka fahimci, kuma ya yarjejenal zuwa Ka'idodi na Jiya nan.
Gabatarwa

Maraba zuwa lorimerjenkins.com ("Shafi"). Lan∆ôwassar Asira nan bayyana ta hanyar Lorimer Jenkins ("ni," "ni," ko "ta ni") suka kar…ìo, suka amfani, kuma suka karya bayani lokacin da ka ziyarci shafin gida nan.
Bayani da Na Kar…ìo
Bayani da aka Samu Kai Tsaye
Lokacin da ka ziyarci Shafi, na kar…ìo bayani ta kai ta hanyar Google Analytics, gida:

items: Adireshin IP ta kai (ba cewa kai ba)
Shafunan da ka ziyarci kuma lokacin da ka kuka da shafin

content.content: Bayani da Ka Samar
Halin yanzu, Shafi na ba kar…ìo bayani na sirrin jiya daga masu amfani ta hanyar boye ko asusu, tare da kusan ishiyar:

**Janyuwar Ba da Jiya na Malamai:** Idan ka tunka…óa ni game da ba da jiya jinyawa ta ita imel, na iya kar…ìo kuma ajiye bayani da ka za…ìi ya samun, gida sunanka, adireshin imel, bayani kamfani, abubuwan gida-gida, kuma kuma sauran bayani da aka ∆ôunshi cikin sadarwa ta kai.
Nawa da Na Amfani Bayani

Na amfani bayani da aka kar…ìo ta Google Analytics zuwa fahimci nawa masu amfani suke amfani Shafi, inganta abin da ya ∆ôunshi kuma kasuwa mai amfani, bincike abubuwan da suka yi, kuma sarrafa aiki Shafi.
Na amfani bayani da aka samar ta hanyar janyuwar ba da jiya na malamai zuwa bincike janyuwar ba da jiya na mai siri, tattauna tare da magajiya, kuma ajiye bayani na sadarwa da aka daidai da jiya.
Google Analytics

Shafi na amfani Google Analytics, janya na bincike na yanar gida wanda Google LLC ke sarrafa. Google Analytics na amfani kuki zuwa taimakawa bincike nawa masu amfani suke amfani Shafi. Don bayani da yawa nawa Google na amfani bayani, jiya zuwa: [Lan∆ôwassar Asira na Google](https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites)
Karya Iko
Ka iya karya Google Analytics ta saurin [Google Analytics Karya Iko Tsinke-tsinke na Taratacce](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout) ko canja sakunin taratacce zuwa dakatar ko kawar kuki.
Kuki

Kuki nawa ne rubutuwan karamawa da ke ajiye ta rubutu. Shafi na amfani kuki ne kawai ta hanyar Google Analytics don dalilai da aka bayyana a sama. Ka iya sarrafa za…ìi kuki ta hanyar sakunin taratacce.
Ajiyar Bayani

Bayani Google Analytics ana ajiye na tsawon watannin 26 daga kwanan da aka kar…ìo, a baje haka, ana kawar shi kai tsaye. Bayani da aka samar ta hanyar janyuwar ba da jiya na malamai ana ajiye domin lokaci da ya dace ko kamar shari'a ta bukaci.
Sadarwan Ba da Jiya na Malamai
Idan ka aika mani abubuwan gida-gida ko sauran bayani da aka daidai da jiya:

items: Na daw da bayani ta hankali waje
Na iya aika bayani tare da masu shawarwari na sana'a ∆ôar∆ôashin wajibina asira inda aka bukaci
Ba ni iya bani tabbatarwa cikakken asira
Ba ni sayar ko aika bayani tare da jama'a na mai-asiri don abubuwan kasuwa
Ba ka wajabi aika bayani da ba ka daidai ba ki bayyana

content.content: Alaka daga Sauran
Shafi na iya ∆ôunshi alaka zuwa shagagge na mai-asiri. Ba ni alaka a abubuwan da suka yi asiri na wa…óannan shagagge. Na bukata ka bincike lan∆ôwassari su.
Ha∆ôi∆ôan Kai

Ta bakin matsayin aiki, ka iya ∆ôanye wuni game da bayani ta kai, gida aiki zuwa bayani bayani da na ajiye game da kai, bukaci kawar bayani ta kai, adawa zuwa sarrafa, kuma aiki bayani. Don amfani da wa…óannan ha∆ôi∆ôan, tunka…óa ni a heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Don Ziyarci EU (GDPR)

Idan ka ajiye a gida na Tarayyar Turai, ka ∆ôanye wuni na samari a ∆ôar∆ôashin Abin Asira na Bayani na Gida (GDPR). Matsakaici na shari'a don sarrafa bayani ta kai shi ne sha'awa halal zuwa inganta kuma bincike Shafi, kuma don janyuwar ba da jiya na malamai, sha'awa halal zuwa bincike janyuwar ba da jiya na mai siri.
Don Ziyarci California (CCPA)
Idan kai mai zama California, ka ∆ôanye wuni a ∆ôar∆ôashin Abin Asira na Mutane na California (CCPA), gida aiki zuwa bayani bayani na sirrin da aka kar…ìo kuma aiki zuwa bukaci kawar.
Asira na Yara
Shafi na ba waje zuwa yara ∆ôar∆ôashin shekara 18. Ba ni carki karba bayani na sirrin jiya daga yara ∆ôar∆ôashin 18. Idan ka tunani na ba da bayani ba, tunka…óa ni zuwa kawar.
Canja zuwa Lan∆ôwassar Nan
Na iya sabunta Lan∆ôwassar Asira nan daga lokaci zuwa lokaci. Duk canja za ta aika a shafin nan tare da ta∆ôoin "Jiya na ∆òarshe" da aka sabunta.
Kariya
Duk da na bu∆ôata karya bayani, babu hanya na transmission a kan yanar gida wanda shi ne 100% kariya. Ba ni iya bani tabbatarwa cikakken kariya bayani da aka aika zuwa ko ajiye a Shafi.
Tunka…óa
Idan ka da wuni game da Lan∆ôwassar Asira nan, tunka…óa ni a heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Ta amfani Shafi, ka bani izini zuwa kar…ìo kuma amfani bayani kamar aka bayyana a Lan∆ôwassar Asira nan.

ProjectsPage.title: Abubuwan da na yi
ProjectsPage.roleAstro: CEO tun lokacin karba, har ma a matsayin mai bugi kabari na pre-seed
ProjectsPage.walletyDescription: A [Polkadot](https://polkadot.com) & [Kusama](https://kusama.network/) ecosystem website na nazari, wanda ke niyya a nuna wa masu amfani nazari mai amfani game da wallets nasu kamar kashe ku…ói, amfani kowane wata, CSV fitar da ku…ói da aka biya a caji sadarwa. Na taya hannu ga 2 jingina daga [Kusama DAO](https://dune.com/substrate/kusama-gov), wa…óanda an mayar da su demi gida tun da nina so in shiga [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com/).
ProjectsPage.othentDescription: Abubuwan da [Othent](https://othent.io) ya so yake yin shi shi ne ba a daidaita jama'ar online don shiga abubuwan blockchain, ba tare da amfani da sarari cryptographic da aka saka kuma ayi amfani da sakamako Oauth kamar da Google. Na aiwatar da abubuwan kamar da 1 malamin waje da aka aiwatar a gida a [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), kamfanin ha…ìakawa abubuwan da [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) ya aiwatar a [Arweave](https://arweave.org) jama'ar. [Othent](https://othent.io) ya kasancewar karba…óe ta [Wander](https://wander.app) a abubuwan asali nasu, [Arweave](https://arweave.org) & [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) jama'ar Web3 jikin jari da ya kasancewar da masu jari ema 50,000, kasancewar [Wander Connect](https://www.wander.app/connect).
ProjectsPage.liquidOpsDescription: A ha…óin jari da aro na musamman wanda aka gina akan [AO](https://ao.arweave.net), wanda ke niyya bubugun ku…ói ya ji da $400m kar…ìar [Arweave](https://arweave.org) tokens ∆ôimar. Na hadawa da shi tare da [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer), ya zama 1st Fellow na jerin kamfani a fita daga [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), ya jawo dubu-dubu na [waitlist](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1863863983498805473?s=20) ziyarci wanda ya taya zuwa $55m soft-commits don kimantarwa tare da jerin bayani, [ka…ói](https://x.com/aoTheVentures/status/1813676139795374171?s=20) a [AO Ventures](https://www.aoventures.io) demo ranar da sai na taya [$325k pre-seed round](https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/revolutionizing-defi-how-lorimer-jenkins-marton-lederer-are-transforming-arweave-liquidops-1729945). Mun ∆ôaddamar da mainnet, muna da wadatattun ha…óin gida ciki har da AO Chrome/IOS/Andriod wallets [Wander](https://wander.app) ([demo a nan](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ODxijaC0Dc)) & [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com) ([demo a nan](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GeQ01-rBUPQ&t=11s)). Mun kuma gama & wajen da karatu daga kamfanoni [Spearbit](https://cantina.xyz/solutions/spearbit) & [Quantstamp](https://quantstamp.com/).
ProjectsPage.contentCreationDescription: Ina yin abun bidiyo akan duk manyan dandali na media. Na niyya wannan ya zama kyakkyawan hanya don gina jama'a ta kan laini, nuna duniya abin da nake aiki da shi da haduwa da sabuwar mutane a sabuwar wurare. Na kuma fara podcast mai suna [Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).
ProjectsPage.cryptoTeenDescription: [Crypto Teen](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins) shi ne channel na TikTok na crypto da niyya nawa ilmi Gen Z abubuwan kaita crypto, ha…ìaka abubuwan da ake zanye kuma yin aiki a sadarwa blockchain.
ProjectsPage.subsidisejsDescription: Subsidise JS package da aka aiwatar don bani [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) don dam…ìa abubuwan sadarwa tare da kuma biya gas kudin don sauran abubuwan sadarwa ta [ANS-102](https://github.com/ArweaveTeam/arweave-standards/blob/ans/ANS-102.md) Arweave sadarwa tsaro. Na niyya in dam…ìa haka a sauran abubuwan wanda suke bu∆ôatar rufe masu jari gas kudin aike, wanda zai bani jama'ar ba bu∆ôata ko biya AR kudin don yin amfani da Web 2 jama'a abin da aka gina akan Arweave.
ProjectsPage.astroDescription: Astro shi ne magani na kudin karuwa da aka gina don dam…ìa mai kasua a Web3 jama'ar. Ta tara sadarwa kudin gaida da kudin abubuwan gida a …óaya, da sa ya jitu - USDA, Astro tabbaci kasua mai kasua tsakanin abubuwan duniya kuma abubuwan sadarwa.
ProjectsPage.coolarweaveaddressDescription: Repo nan ya bani ka yin samarwa da ema da [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) don ganin kyau da sarari jikin jari adreshi. Claude za ta gane kyau adreshi ka…óai a tushen niyya naka da aka za…ìi.
ProjectsPage.aothecomputerDescription: Abokin tarayya ya gaya mani labarinsa na iya karbar gaggarra da jiya a ku…ói kadan kwarai, na yi mamakin (da kuma dan hausa) ba za ni iya dakatar da tunawa akan kyautar da ya samu. Saboda haka na fara bincike Namecheap don ganin akwai wasu kyautan da ke jiran. Sanin [AO The Computer .com](https://aothecomputer.com) yana samuwa don siyya $11.48 a shekara, dauki haka [redacted] üòú.
ProjectsPage.aohtmlDescription: AO HTML shine kayan aiki wanda ke ba ka damar yin gida ta hanyar fayil HTML wanda ke sabunta bisa zuwa abin da aka isar daga sadarwar AO ta wata aiki. Yi tunani game da gida wanda bake daidai tare da isar abubuwa ta hanyar dan isar bake daidai kamar DAO, alal misali gida zai sabunta bayan gida AO proposal ta kar…ìa da duk Web2 gidan gabatarwa akan Vercel/Netlify zai yi haka kuma ta amfani da wannan rubutu.

About.description: Ni mai kaddara daga England wanda ke yawo a cikin US/UK/EU a cikin AirBnb's. Ina sha'awar crypto, startups da software development. Ina da asali a venture capital da acting. Ni kuma mai aiki da talaka kuma ina gudanar da podcast mai suna [Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).
About.tagline: MAI KASUA ‚Ä¢ GIDA ‚Ä¢ MAI ∆òIR∆òIRA ‚Ä¢ MAI SAKA JARI

Podcast.title: Lorimer's Podcast
Podcast.description: Shiga gida tare da ni don zurfin tattaunawa tare da masu kafa aiki, masu saka jari, da masu gina aiki a cikin halin startup. Ina bincika labarun bayan ayyuka, dakuna da aka koya, da gida na fasahun daban-daban.

SubstackSignup.title: Kasance a cikin ilimi
SubstackSignup.description: Shiga jarida tawa don kar…ìar sabuwar abubuwan blog kai tsaye a akwatin ajiya. Ina rubuta game da abubuwan farawa, crypto, gina a jama'a da koyi da aka koya daga jirgin tafiyata na mi a matsayin masu kafa.

FAQ.title: Tambayoyi Da Aka Tambaya Sau da Yawa
FAQ.a1: Ni mai kafa na gina LiquidOps, tsarin baje da aro akan AO. Har ila yau, na jefa kudin angelus a kan manufofi na farko da na gida kuma na aiki kan abubuwa game da manufofi, cryptocurrency, da gina a jiya.
FAQ.q2: Kana da sauri don aiki na shawarwari ko gida?
FAQ.a2: Ba ni da aiki na shawarwari saboda na gaskata cewa masu shawarwari sau da yawa ba su daidai ba. Na fi so in jefa kudin angelus a kan masu kafa da na so in gida a kai.
FAQ.q3: Ta yaya zan iya gabatar da ni don jefar da kudin?
FAQ.a3: Ka aika mini imel a [heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) tare da gwajin jefar da kudin. Sau da yawa na jefa kudade daga $500-$5,000 a cikin zagaye na pre-seed don kamfanoni masu gina a wurare da na karantawa.
FAQ.q4: Wajen fasahar da kake aiki da ita?
FAQ.a4: Da farko na aiki da TypeScript, React, Next.js, da blockchain fasahar ciki har da Arweave da AO. Ni mai ilmantarwa na kanka mai yawa gida.
FAQ.q5: Zan iya zama mawakin jirgin sauka a kan podkastinka?
FAQ.a5: Koyaushe nake neman magana da manufofi mai ban sha'awa, masu jefa kudin, da masu gina. Ka tunkaari ta imel a [heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) tare da wani abu ne game da kanaka da abin da kake son kumanta.

FilmsPage.title: Fina & TV
FilmsPage.subtitle: Littafin ∆ôididdige fina & TV nawa
FilmsPage.marginCallDescription: Fina mai ban sha'awa da ke aiki sama da 24 sa'a a Wall Street banki na jari a baje jiya kashin 2008.
FilmsPage.theBigShortDescription: Barkwaciyar kakaita na ainihin labarin masu jari wa…óanda suka gani kuma suka samun ku…ói daga rufaffiyar gida na 2008.
FilmsPage.theWolfOfWallStreetDescription: Almajirin ainihin labarin Jordan Belfort, jari waje waje wanda ya damje masu jari da miliyan yayin cin aiki masu yawa.
FilmsPage.billionsDescription: Dramaren ba ta gajeren jiya kan jari mai karfi sakandare waje waje da kuma mai bincike na kasar.
FilmsPage.goldDescription: Daga ainihin jiya, mai nani jari tare da masani geologist don neman zinari a jeji Indonesia, leda ga babbar badi laifi.
FilmsPage.warDogsDescription: Matashin jari biyu suka amfani da shawar gwamnati don zama jaji mahadi na duniya, daga ainihin labarin da ba a yarde.
FilmsPage.uncutGemsDescription: Jari mai fasaha a New York's Diamond District yana yin badi masu karfi masu dadi don tsayar gaba da binciken ku…óin sa.
FilmsPage.catchMeIfYouCanDescription: Ainihin labarin Frank Abagnale Jr., jari mai wayo wanda ya yi aiki a hanya na jirgin sama, likita, da mai shari'a ‚Äî duka kafin shekara ta 19.
FilmsPage.wecrashedDescription: Jigon tashi da faduwar WeWork da jarin sa mai sifa amma mai shawara Adam Neumann.
FilmsPage.djangoUnchainedDescription: Baiwa jiya tare da jari jaji Jamus don ceto matarsa daga gida mai tsanani na Mississippi.
FilmsPage.pulpFictionDescription: Jeri masu ha…óawa na laifi da komawa gida a Los Angeles, fa…óin Tarantino na san hanya.
FilmsPage.inglouriousBasterdsDescription: Jama'ar soja Yahudi-American yana plan kashe jari Nazi a kasua Farensa a lokacin Ya∆ôi ta Duniya ta Biyu.
FilmsPage.kidulthoodDescription: Bayani sauki da mara yiwuwa a saatin 48 a rayuwar jama'ar matasa a Yamma London.
FilmsPage.adulthoodDescription: Shekara jiya bayan jiya na Kidulthood, Sam yana fito jiya da kuma dole ya fuskanci sakamakon ainihin jiya.
FilmsPage.brotherhoodDescription: Karshe katsina a jigon jigon biya Sam yana ∆ôo∆ôari wa bari jiya ta baya sannan tsohuwar gaba suka komo.
FilmsPage.riseOfTheFootsoldierDescription: Tsanantaccen ainihin labarin mai hunkali takaita Essex kusan jama'a mamaye aiki a kasua 1980s da 90s.
FilmsPage.topBoySummerhouseDescription: Shirye na Channel 4 na farko yana bin jaji mahadi yana yin aiki a waje mai ha…óari na estate a Hackney, Yamma London.
FilmsPage.topBoyDescription: Netflix na komo shine jigon Dushane da Sully ina fuskanci don dawo matsari a jaji mahadi na London.
FilmsPage.peakyBlindersDescription: Jigon mamaye a 1920s Birmingham, biyan Shelby laifi damini tashi a karfi.
FilmsPage.snatchDescription: Hada ha…óa-ha…óa na London mamaye, masu talaka boxing, da zinari mai sani suke taba a wannan barkwacinsa laifi.
FilmsPage.lockStockAndTwoSmokingBarrelsDescription: Matashin East End gida suka shiga hada-ha…óa ba komai bayan takaita ta ita ce sai su biya rabin miliyon pound.
FilmsPage.breakingBadDescription: Makaranta chemistry makaranta yana musulunta amfani da gida ba ya kashe ciki bayan sanin jiya.
FilmsPage.betterCallSaulDescription: Gida baje Breaking Bad yana biyan yaren Jimmy McGill sauya kashe shari'a yaji Saul Goodman.
FilmsPage.elCaminoABreakingBadMovieDescription: Bayan abubuwan Breaking Bad, Jesse Pinkman yana tsere daga bugi dole ya gane jiya ba wa kula sabuwa.
FilmsPage.interstellarDescription: Jama'ar bincike suka wuce wormhole a sarari don nemi sabuwar gida mai gida kamar Duniya ta kai tsaye.
FilmsPage.parasiteDescription: Talaka jama'a yana mauni da shiga deriya mai arzi∆ôi, sannan yana da kashe kusan sa∆ôo.
FilmsPage.blackMirrorDescription: Jigon anthologin da rashin rai yana raye kashin ka∆ôaki na fasaha da sa'arsa a lokaci na yau.
FilmsPage.oblivionDescription: A duniya baje ta gida, drone karfafa yana neman jirgin ru…óu sannan ya nemi abubuwan da suka tambaye shi.
FilmsPage.exMachinaDescription: Masorin masorin jari yana saya don yin ita wajirin ilimin ∆ôarfi na jari na farko AI.
FilmsPage.iAmMotherDescription: Yarinyar matashi da robot a hypo ku…óun suka fara tambaye ta duniyarsu lokacin da abin ba∆ôi ya zo.
FilmsPage.snowpiercerDescription: A duniya sanyi ta gida, sai nawa na jama'a sun zauna a jirgi mai yin gidia ramana ta gida.
FilmsPage.getOutDescription: Jaji Bakin jiya yana ziyarci deriya mai yana jaya sojin kaifi kayin jigon gida firgita bada saani.
FilmsPage.prisonersDescription: Lokacin biyu yarnya suka bace, mahaifi mai nutsu yana damre abin sa a gida sannan jaji yana neman ba sanin.
FilmsPage.birdBoxDescription: Mace da jiya jiya dole su wuce riaba ta gida ba ganin sannan bugi da suke kashe mutane.
FilmsPage.thePlatformDescription: A bugi na tsaye kamar tudu abinci yana sauko waje ta waje, bugi dole su fuskanci yunwa da jama'a.
FilmsPage.thePlatform2Description: Sabuwa jama'a bugi ta ita gida ta sanu ita yana da ∆ôarfe sabuwa da ke damre rayuwa.
FilmsPage.glassOnionAKnivesOutMysteryDescription: Jaji Benoit Blanc yana tashi a gida na fasaha deriya a gida Grik na jaji new sabuwa sannan abokan sa.
FilmsPage.dontLookUpDescription: Masani biyu suka nemi comet yana baje daga sarari amma suka fada sharaftar duniya ba ta ji don komawa.
FilmsPage.thePerksOfBeingAWallflowerDescription: Matashi mara ha…ói yana yiwuwa hali-hali na jiya tare da waje biyu mai fasaha.
FilmsPage.titanicDescription: Yarinyar shekara jiya tana so jaji …óan-aiki a jirgi R.M.S. Titanic.
FilmsPage.thePursuitOfHappynessDescription: Tamanin labarin ainihin Chris Gardner, mai sana'a mai gwaba wanda ya zama ba gida yayin yin jiya da karfafa shari'a.
FilmsPage.theBoyInTheStripedPyjamasDescription: Jiya mai kusanci tsakanin jari Nazi jari da Yahudi yaro a bugi.
FilmsPage.jokerDescription: Barkwaci ba ya iya yana faduwa jiya yana zama Gotham City sanannun laifi ‚Äî Joker.
FilmsPage.theIrishmanDescription: Jaji da jiya yana tunani jiya na laifi, sa a Bufalino jama'a, da faduwa Jimmy Hoffa.
FilmsPage.forRestGumpDescription: Jari mai mutuwaci ba shi sani amma yana sa jiya abubuwan tarihiye a 20th lokaci.
FilmsPage.theQueensGambitDescription: Shatarancin talaka yana fuskanci gida yunwa yayin tashi jigon jaji jara lockdown lokacin Tsoro.
FilmsPage.babyReindeerDescription: Barkwaci mai damuwa jiya suka damre lokacin sama da mace a bari yana zama mai sani sakamakon.
FilmsPage.dexterDescription: Jaji mahadi jiya a Miami polisa yana damre rayuwa biyu kashe jaji wanda yana nemi mamaye waje.
FilmsPage.tigerKingDescription: Ainihin labarin yara na Joe Exotic, mai jinya gida sannan kusa jiya kashin, malam da gaba.
FilmsPage.jimmySavileABritishHorrorStoryDescriptio: Gani firgita documentary yana nemirar Jimmy Savile waje yana kare shekaru na laifi baje sa malama waje.
FilmsPage.hitlerTheRiseOfEvilDescription: Gida biyu jigon labarin Adolf Hitler jiya da firgita kashen jirgin sama ba jiye karfafa.
FilmsPage.squidGameDescription: Daruruwan jama'a ba ku…óin suna yarda ko fuskanci jiya na jiya sakin ha…ói ‚Äî da mai kashe sakamakon.
FilmsPage.theExpendablesDescription: Jama'ar jaji elite yana ba doka kashe jaji mai karfi Latin.
FilmsPage.theExpendables2Description: Jaji suka komo ta aiki mara sauki sannan suka dade kashen gida.
FilmsPage.theExpendables3Description: Barney Ross yana samun sabuwa jaji matasa don kashe jaji tsohuwa jaji mahadi.
